properties.description:
Mad Men Season Five Finale Watch Party

Head to Lounge 201 (201 Massachusetts Avenue NE) Sunday for a complete with 60s costume contest, Mad Men trivia, and retro food and drink. 8:00-11:00 p.m. $10 general admission, $20 admission and two hour open bar.

Big Backyard Beach Bash and Wine Fest

EatBar (2761 Washington Boulevard Arlington VA) is throwing a on Saturday, serving up conch fritters, fish tacos and crab sliders, and Red Apron hot dogs. 12:00-3:00 p.m. $25.grill hot dogs.

Ballston Arts & Crafts Market

The sets up shop next to the Ballston metro this Saturday for the first of five dates this summer. Nearly 35 artists and crafters will be on hand selling their wares. 10:00-4:00 p.m.

Seersucker Bike Ride and Social

Feeling dandy? Get fancy, grab your bike, and take part in this years bike ride from Dandies and Quaintrelles. After the ride enjoy a lawn party at Hillwood with jazz, cocktails, paper hat-making, and more. 11:00-7:00 p.m.
